subject:
Re: svn commit: samba r22418 - in branches/SAMBA_3_0/source: .
	include lib nsswitch smbd
body:
On Sat, Apr 21, 2007 at 02:54:42PM -0700, James Peach wrote:
> 
> Yeh, that's what I was doing with the init_sockets_smbd and  
> init_sockets_launchd. It would be very easy to stuff these behind a  
> single function that does the right thing.

If you could do that it would be great. I'm going to bed
now..... (No... Sleep... 'Til... Brooklyn ! :-).
